name: Frozen Gold
description:
This is a Psychological Horror, Trolling Rage Type Platformer. 

Is There a way to the TOP?

Do you think you have what it takes to enjoy this relaxing climb to the Top?

Game Pad capable

Keyboard controls 

Score And Timer. 

Who can collect as much Gold in as short amount of Time as possible.

Unfortunately this game is only for Windows - 64
